title: Timber King’s Shuswap Sanctuary
address: 1897 Blind Bay Road, Sorrento, BC V0E 2W0
features: Handcrafted Pioneer log home by HGTV’s Timber Kings, featuring 320ft of private Shuswap shoreline, massive floor-to-ceiling stone fireplace, and a detached triple garage with industrial-grade power.

title: The Kal-Lake Cattle Landmark
features: Iconic legacy ranch with signature orange roofs. Massive agricultural acreage overlooking Kalamalka Lake with irrigation licenses and immediate proximity to Kekuli Bay Provincial Park.

title: Okanagan Azure Vineyard Manor
address: 12056 Okanagan Centre Road W, Lake Country, BC V4V 2H5
features: Tuscan-inspired lakefront estate with 400ft shoreline. Includes a 3-bed separate lakeside cottage, private dock with lifts, and a producing orchard providing farm status.
